name: Another Zombie Game (BugFactory)
description:
There are tons of zombie games but...here is another.

This game is made for fun and practical purpose. My apologies for potential bugs and mistakes.

Game description

Game has two different levels. First you must kill all "regular" zombies and second level is boss fight.

Controls

w,a,s,d - movement

left mouse click - shooting

1,2 - change weapon

shift - run

Please enjoy!
